name: Gods Of Wrestling
description:
Scroll down the the bottom of this page for the file downloads

How to play Gods Of Wrestling

Click the dots that appear on screen. (If the dots move to fast for you to click open the options menu and change you're level of difficulty to easy.) Different dots do different damage amounts.   

Dot Damage Table

 Dot ColorDot Damage AmountRed1 Blue1Green5Yellow5Character Face60

All damage amounts do not include the bonus you gain from you're character.
